title.rendered: Download Minecraft Free – Latest English Version on CCM

content.rendered:
In Minecraft you have the task of individually changing a world made entirely of cubes. During the day you can mine undisturbed raw materials and explore the landscape. But as soon as it gets dark, numerous monsters come out of their hiding places and hunt you down. Various weapons and armor are available to you.

What does Minecraft offer?

Minecraft is one of the best selling video games in the world. It was first released in 2009 and has been owned by Microsoft since 2014. the Whole Minecraft world consists of cubes. The player also creates his constructions from cubes. He can also explore the open game world to collect resources, fight monsters and combine found raw materials into new items.

The laws of physics don’t apply in Minecraft. For example, the blocks are weightless during construction. Sources of water and lava – the only liquids in the game – are easy to turn off, unlike in the real world. Day and night change every 20 minutes. There is three different dimensions: the upper world, the hell-like Nether with lava and stronger monsters and the end, which can be accessed through portals in the fortresses placed in the game world.

Minecraft features five game modes: Survival Mode, Hardcore Mode, Creative Mode, Adventure Mode and Spectator Mode. The player can choose between four levels of difficulty Select. All modes can be played in single and multiplayer mode. Minecraft is regularly updated and expanded.

How much does Minecraft cost?

By clicking on the Download button At the top of this page you can download a demo version of the Java Edition of Minecraft. This allows you to test Minecraft for five days of play. You can create a free account and later switch to the paid version or play as a guest. To do this, just click the button in the Minecraft launcher To play:

The full version for Windows 10 is available from Mojang and here in the Microsoft Store from 26.99 euros.

Minimum system requirements

  • Operating system: Windows 10 version 17134.0 or later
  • Processor: Intel Celeron J4105 or AMD FX-4100
  • R.A.M: 4GB
  • Hard disk: 3 GB of free storage space
  • Graphic card: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or AMD Radeon R5
  • DirectX: version 11

other systems

Minecraft Java Edition is also available on Mojang’s official Minecraft website for macOS, Linux, Android, iOS, Xbox One, Xbox 360, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, Wii U, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo 3DS, Amazon Fire TV and Oculus.

Other versions and addons

Here at CCM you will also find Minecraft Pocket Edition for iPhone, Minecraft Earth for Android and Minecraft Education Edition for Windows.

You can also spice up your gaming experience on Android devices with Addons for Minecraft, Toolbox for Minecraft Pocket Edition and Buildings for Minecraft.

Minecraft mods, tips and tricks

There are countless mods for Minecraft to expand the base game. The mods also have a very active community. Here’s how to install Minecraft mods with Forge.
